Title: Targeted Ads
Description:
Hi, hi, hi! You looking for a gig?

We're doing a BIG opening sale for our new Crafting Order service, and we need to draw attention! But the wind took my flyers and I think some of the local goats ran off with them.

Could you get my flyers back?
ObjectivesText: Recover flyers from Forkriver and Meddlesome Goats.
RewardText: Thank you, thank you, thank you! You're the best $p!

Objectives.Text: "Public Orders: Fast and Made For You!" recovered
"Custom High-Quality Gear ... with Personal Orders!" recovered
